A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Most everything I feel  about this movie has already been said here. So I'll just say this - forget about the fans' subverted expectations with Luke's storyline\, forget about the unanswered questions\, hell\, forget about many of the complaints being lodged at this movie. And what are we left with? Aside from a few great scenes and bits of good dialogue here and there\, we're left with a convoluted plot\, poor writing\, confused themes\, out of place humor\, and terrible subplots. TLJ would become watchable for me if it was cleaned up a bit and was 45 minutes shorter. Remove some poor humor\, the whole casino plot\, and a bunch of other silly shit and it becomes a B minus movie for me. Not great\, but watchable.
